setting.name: CONNECTION_STRING
setting.value: Provider=IBMDADB2;Database=SAMPLE;Hostname=localhost;Port=50000;Uid=db2admin;Pwd=mits123$;Protocol=TCPIP

setting.name: UNIQUE_CODE
setting.value: select * from ADMINISTRATOR.UNIQUE_CODE

setting.name: N_FUNCTION
setting.value: select distinct FUNCTION from ADMINISTRATOR.FUNCTION_DOCTYPE order by FUNCTION asc

setting.name: N_DOCTYPE
setting.value: select DOCUMENT_TYPE from ADMINISTRATOR.FUNCTION_DOCTYPE order by DOCUMENT_TYPE asc

setting.name: N_VENDOR
setting.value: select DISTINCT VENDOR_NAME from ADMINISTRATOR.VENDOR_DETAILS

setting.name: UNIQUE_CODE_VALUES
setting.value: select * from ADMINISTRATOR.UNIQUE_CODE where UNIQUE_CODE=':Uniquecode'

setting.name: FUNCTION_VALUES
setting.value: select DOCUMENT_TYPE from ADMINISTRATOR.FUNCTION_DOCTYPE where FUNCTION=':Uniquecode' order by DOCUMENT_TYPE asc

setting.name: VENDOR_STATUS
setting.value: select FUNCTION, FIELD_STATUS from ADMINISTRATOR.FUNCTION_DOCTYPE where DOCUMENT_TYPE =':Uniquecode' order by DOCUMENT_TYPE asc

setting.name: FA_FUNCTIONS_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'Function' AND G.NAME = ':groupName' AND C.GROUP_ID = G.ID

setting.name: FA_SUBFUNCTIONS_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'SubFunction' AND C.DEPENDS_ON = :dependsOn

setting.name: CATEGORIES_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = ':categoryName' AND G.NAME = ':groupName' AND C.GROUP_ID = G.ID

setting.name: R_FINYEARS_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'FinYear' AND G.NAME = ':groupName' AND C.GROUP_ID = G.ID

setting.name: R_ENTITIES_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'Entity' AND G.NAME = ':groupName' AND C.GROUP_ID = G.ID

setting.name: R_DOCUMENT_TYPES_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'Document_Type' AND G.NAME = ':groupName' AND C.GROUP_ID = G.ID

setting.name: R_DOCUMENT_SUBTYPES_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.ID, C.NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C WHERE C.PROPERTY_NAME = 'Document_Subtype' AND C.DEPENDS_ON = :selectedDocumentType

setting.name: SHORT_NAME_SQL
setting.value: SELECT C.SHORT_NAME FROM db2admin.CATEGORY C, db2admin.GROUP G WHERE GROUP_ID=G.ID AND G.NAME=':groupName' AND C.PROPERTY_NAME=':propertyName' AND C.NAME=':categoryName'

setting.name: STATES_SQL
setting.value: SELECT * FROM db2admin.Category WHERE Property_Name = 'State'

setting.name: MONTHS_SQL
setting.value: SELECT * FROM db2admin.Category WHERE Property_Name = 'Month'

setting.name: SERVERIP
setting.value: EDEKALMILUAT001

setting.name: USERNAME
setting.value: DMSP8admin

setting.name: OBJECTSTORE
setting.value: FINOS
